content.detailedDescription:
I was picking  my son 9 years from the bus station returning from vacation.
comming back home with my car and my son, i stop to the trafic light. when are waiting upon the trafic light,  i see the sky  strong light like star apearence.
i told my son what beatiful stars on sky are,  suddenly i saw that the stars light are changing position and are brighter. then i told my son that are helicopters.
in the left side of our view where 2 lights on horizontal line and other 3 in triangle formation. the lights are become stronger and move from nw to n all together.
the color of my trafic light changed to green , i  start my car i saw the the lights are move and disapear on the sky after 4 minutes.
after that i realize that are defininetly not helicopters.
content.summary: 2 were in one line left side  , and 3 were in triangle formation right side

content.detailedDescription: In raton nm elevation 6600 feet , i went outside at 945pm mountain time, my buddy looked at the sky and said did you see that, and at first i couldn't then i thought i saw some light for a fraction of a second but wasn't sure. then what appeared to be a boomerang shape object in the western sky moving north, it had no lights on it but could be seen reflecting the lights from the town. the object moved all around in and out of the clouds, then another boomerang object appeared and was flying south. when the objects entered the clouds or came close to the clouds they became brighter. the clouds were maybe 10000 feet high. the objects became to change shape into rectangles, circles, blob looking things, then they would form a triangle then brake apart in 50 pieces then join together in a perfect triangle, square, or circle, they would change direction at perfect 90 degree angles without stopping, they would get bigger then smaller, and fly out of sight up  high or in the distance then come back into view a second later but in a different location. for about 25 minutes this happen, i saw it with my friend my sister and two neighbors. and the whole time not a sound was made. at first the objects appeared white, then become a yellow color. one of them became almost a see through circle and then like a blob sort of circle. also one went below the clouds and became a huge rectangle yellow shape for about 5 seconds then shrunk back down. most of the time they were white but changed to yellow at times. sometimes they appeared to move slowly then other times very  rapidly, easily out running a plane. there was a plane about 30000 feet about half way though the event but was no where near the flying objects, and we could hear the plane, and it flow west in a straight line. when i first noticed the objects i thought it was a hang glider and wondered why someone would be doing this at night, and where they would've jumped off of to be that high in the sky, but it quickly gained speed and flew in all directions, that was ruled out. i thought it was awesome, never seen anything like that, not sure what it was, but was excited the whole time....Still am. lost sight of the objects all at once, they just disappeared. when i grabbed my camcorder the objects disappeared.
content.shape: Boomerang,   Chevron,   Circle,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Various objects with various shapes, unknown number

content.detailedDescription: I was out side on the balcony of my grandmas apartment listening to music on my phone and i was looking up at the sky and that's when i spotted the 5 balls of light close together just moving in a half u and would stop in about a minute. and so i thought it was lightning in the clouds but i stopped to think they were lightning when they stopped without moving for a minute and repeatedly moved in a half u. i called my friend and mom to tell her what was happening but i ran out of battery so i went inside to charge my phone and by the time i went back out the lights were spread out in a half circle and they went in different directions so fast i then was really sure that that was not an aircraft of any kind because i don't think we have anything that can move out that fast in a blink of an eye. i was kinda really freaked out by it when they suddenly took off that i scraped my elbow against the wall. and i don't have any recording of the phenomenon i saw because it was really dark outside and the 5 balls of light wasn't that bright either. right after i witnessed that i for sure believe that there is something else out there.
content.summary: At night covered by the clouds but can see the light through it and there were 5 balls of light moving in a u

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my bed watching netflix on my ipad. the lights are off and im facing an open window. when this very very bright orange light appears above the treeline across the street. so bright it captures my attention from the show i was watching. it was slowly rising above the tree line.  it was just so odd, because it was so bright. i got up and went to the window and watched the light hover. at first i thought someone lit off a firework, but it was way bigger and brighter than a firework and it didnt explode, it hovered. then i thought it may be a helicopter flying towards me. but there was no sound. then it seemed to float off to the north, and then started to ascend. once i realized it couldnt be a helicopter i grabbed my phone to take a video. it started asending and them the color of the lights seemed to change. eventually, as you can see in the video....The light just disappears. so i stood there staring for awhile wondering what i just witnessed, if anything. after a few minutes.....A new big bright orange/yellow light rises above the treeline. i turned my phone on as soon as i saw it and filmed it. this one did not hover.....It just ascended...Until as you can see the light just fades out. 

the first video is of the first one...Which i didnt start taking until it was almost gone, but you see it fade out. the second video is of the second one i saw...Very bright....Ans then it eventually fades out. it was taken through a screen window on a samsung galaxy s iii phone. i also tries to zoom in during the second video.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very bright lights hover then ascend

content.detailedDescription: Saucer shape hidden in a cloud
content.summary: Saucer shape hidden in a cloud

content.detailedDescription: 4. red dots hovered across the sky in mainly triangular formations but changed to lines and disappeared
content.summary: Red dots changed formations as they hovered across the sky

content.detailedDescription: On my porch at approx. 10 pm just enjoying a night breeze with my cousin, i glanced up and seen an object come out of the sky directy north of my hose, it hovered for apprx. 1-2 min. the proceded east at a slow speed, the the sight picture got smaller and smaller until gone, 45 min later another apperead same color, shape..Ect was worried that it had deteced us, after the second one was seen, proceded to get my shotgun
content.summary: Thought it was a meteor until it hovered

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
During my drive from los angeles to phoenix, i spotted lights in the sky that i couldn't explain. at first there was 3 bright lights (of a orange/yellow color), appeared to be in the formation of a triangle. they didn't move, but hovered in the air. they were a good distance away, but still very bright. they were low enough to seem close, but high enough not to be a tower or connected to the ground. after about 5 mins of watching these, another set of 3 lights appeared nearby the first set. for a few minutes you could see both units hovering nearby each other. then the first set disappeared quickly. this same thing reoccured multiple times for the next 30 minutes. the lights would appear and disappear quickly, but always in different positions than the last. when appearing or disappearing, there was no flashing or moving. they did not shoot from the ground or from the sky, they just appeared. 
as i continued to drive, the lights didn't change but became hidden by the mountain range. after driving for another 15 minutes, i could see them again on the other side of the mountain range.
now i was closer than ever, and the lights were super bright! they were so bright that i'm sure they could be visible from miles away. i estimate they were 20 miles south of where i pulled off to look. 
i spotted this event in between indio, ca and the arizona border on highway 10. they were south of highway 10. 
the lights continued to appear for 5-10 minutes, then disappear after another unit arrived. this event lasted for as long as i could see them in my rear view mirror. 

i do have both photos and videos of this event when it occurred.
content.summary: 3 light triangle hovering in sky. a second unit appeared near it, shortly after the first unit disappeared

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I went outside to see my neighbor and looked up at the sky. i saw 5-6 reddish orange lights ascending from west to north in a diagonal line. i thought at first maybe there were a lot of air planes but then i saw an actual air plane flying beside them and it was completely different. the air planes were blinking red and white lights while the unidentified objects were a solid orange color. i asked my neighbor to come outside and see if she could identify them. when she came outside to look up at the sky there were only 2 orange lights. after pointing them out another appeared and we watched them get closer together and farther apart. one by one they disappeared and then after a few minutes they reappeared . there were now three and another neighbor came outside to witness as well.I ran inside to get my video camera but could not find it and my neighbor got a few pictures during this time but the pictures only show a white light instead of orange. an airplane flew by the lights and they almost collided in the same path then the orange light disappeared and the airplane continued to fly by . after a few more moments all of the lights disappeared and we haven't seen them since around 9:30 pm.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red  orange yellow lights in the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my house's terrace with my best friend smoking a cigarette, suddenly he said "look! that star is huge!", and when i looked up i realized it was really bright and sometimes the light's intensity changed. we stared at it for a long time, after a while the object moved in circles and returned to the same position it was before. in that moment we were sure it was a ufo. after some minutes, the object started becoming smaller and smaller and then it returned to the previous size. later, a second object appeared near the other. it was much smaller and had a red light. it flew past the white flying object and descended a little before disappearing. i couldn't believe what i saw, me and my best friend couldn't stop watching it. it felt amazing to see something like that for the first time. we lost sight of the object because we entered the house to get something and when we returned it wasn't there anymore.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I was outside with a friend and we saw at what we thought was a huge star until we realized it was a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home and saw two bright orange objects in the sky.What caught my eye was the brightness of the objects.The objects did not make any sound and were moving from west to east at a good rate of speed.The objects were round.They appeared to remain at the same elevation and disappeared as they moved eastward.
content.summary: Two bright orange fire balls moving west to east.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my boyfriend were at the beach , just the sky , the sea the orizon , it was a beautiful day , we were kissing on the beach and suddenly i felt  that someone watching us , also m. he felt headache ....I watching the sea with the tale of the eye and there was this oval light glowing, around 6ft large , i walked to see what was it , and suddenly this thing get fast towards the horizon visible, we heard strange sound noise like radio distortion like a whistle. i thinked it was an allucination and for joke i said, ok if you are e.T send me some message and at the horizon 3 beams of light out of the water pointing the sky , moves from left to right going underwater and again other 3 from  right to left , each beam of light seemed to rotate on itself. and all 3 lights seemed to rotate togheter .
ater that we was stunned shocked, i cried . i never trust about et co i g to the world , just think like scientists do, after this sighting i trust in the ancient astronauts theory and for many years , the number 33 haunts me . actually in 2013 i had another sightning near my home in puglia south italy and i filmed it !
content.summary: Oval object under the sea at 6 ft from us , me and my boyfriend  felt someone watching us while we kissing. i suddenly stopped myself to watch the sky , i watched the sea with the tail of the ' eye this  light and3 beamsof liight....Continue

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed and photographed some of these while driving and one at night while doing star photography. the first ones i photographed march 8 consisted of 8 different objects in 4 different areas but all were in the same vicinity the first two consists of what looks like exhaust rings except one looks stationary and the other ring white in color shows a trail behind and in front of it.The next objects were sited to my northwest and they were heading east southeast with a corkscrew vapor trail behind them i enlarged the photos to maxim and cold not see any solid structure except that they were extremely bright.The third object was the largest and it was at high altitude and i photographed it with a canon eos t3 digital camera with a 55 mm lens which makes it all the more amazing to see the size of the object at that altitude. lastly from that day i have what are the most perplexing photos because these are at ground or near ground photos and they consist of yellow orange orbs that appear in 3 different photos in trees and in front of a mountain and lastly we have what can be described as gaseous clouds all near the ground or just a few feet above. the second sighting took place app. two weeks later when i photographed the same two brightly lit square objects below a storm front that covered the valley only this time the light that came off of them was bent downward which i thought you couldn`t do.I then photographed these objects towards the end of june at approximately 11 pm coming again from the northwest.Lastly the large craft that i photographed on march 8 2013 i photographed in july this time with a 300mm lens and it looks the same as the first one but a lot higher in elevation as i was pointing the camera almost straight up.
content.summary: I have photographs taken between march 8 and july 8

content.detailedDescription: on the night of 08/30-08/31/2013 at 1210 am and lasting for approximately 5 minutes my son and i observed a red colored object travel from about 15 degrees above the south the horizon to behind the tree line to the east.  we were walking my dogs for their final outing of the day.  we noticed a red light in the sky that at first i thought a an airplane navigation light, but it was to large and was not flashing and no other lights were visible.  it appeared to be coming toward us and turn slightly to the east in a straight level path until it passed out of sight behind the trees to the east.  we heard no noise.  the sky was overcast no stars were visible.  as the object moved it pulsated weakly at a slow rate.
content.summary: Observed red object traveling south to east in a straight line pulsating slowly

content.detailedDescription: i was driving home from work on 328 and i noticed a large blue light over the field to the right of me. the light was blinking uniformly and very hard to miss. i noticed it was getting larger and deduced that it was moving towards me pretty fast. i stopped my car on the side of the road out of curiosity. within seconds, the light was passing to the right of me, still blinking. i got a pretty good look at what seemed to by just a blue light. i know it was dark, but i couldn't see anything holding it there or any other physical object around it or attached to it. it seemed to be about the size of a tire, and less than 500 feet in the air. it was dark though, so i could be incorrect. it was definitely pretty low regardless. the strangest part was that there was no sound. all of my windows were down, and i felt a breeze come through my car as it passed, but it was dead silent throughout the whole encounter. i looked in my rear view mirrors after it passed, but couldn't see anything. in hindsight, i should have gotten out of the car. i would have taken a picture, but i was more focused on figuring out what was happening at the time. i just thought it was strange, but after hearing about other strange events on the very same night in florida, i figured there was a smaller chance that it was a coincidence. this was in caroline county, maryland on august 7, 2013, at around 11:20 pm.
content.summary: A large blinking light sped by me without making a sound.

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 10:15pm august 29th 2013, in dorking surrey looking in night sky towards boxhill, brockham, redhill. i was walking across a playing field where there was very little street lighting. when i noticed up ahead of me in the night sky 3 dull orange lights in a straight line. it immediately caught my eye as i walk the route everynight and always look at the stars. each light was bigger than anything else in the sky at the time and they was bigger than any planet i have seen with the naked eye. as i stopped to view the object i was trying to work out if the lights was part of the same object. it appeared that it was and i could make out a blurred outline (translucent) of something around the outside lights. i focused on the object more and could make out red pulsating lights between the orange lights.(no sound from the obect)
there was a few planes in the sky at the start of the sighting but they was far away from the object up and lights on them was the size of stars. one of the planes was flying across the sky of my perspective of the object which made it clear that these lights were stationary. 
i had stopped walking and was stood in the middle of the playing field focused on the object and i was calling my girlfriend to come out of her house and to look at it to confirm what i was seeing but the was too much light pollution for her to see it. then a fighter jet flew over my head quite low and was heading the direction of the lights. as it flew to wards them the lights didnt move in a direction. it was although the lights disappeared gradually together or the object flew straight ahead away from me.
as i continued my journey after 5 minutes i could hear a helicopter as i looked up i could see 2 army helicopters heading the same direction.
content.summary: Saw stationary orange lights in sky lots bigger that any other sky traffic that it caught my eye

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a sleepover with some of my friends and myself and one of my friends looked out of the window towards the back fields all the way out to the power station. thats when i first noticed it. when i first saw the object i thought it was some hunters or farmers searching their field and shining their lights up into the sky. there were at least 7 objects or beams which seemed to come up from the ground flashing. there was no proper object to be seen just lights. they seemed to flash in a random order only using the colours white, green and red. i was really scared when i knew it couldn't be farmers or hunters because they would need an enormous amount of power to cast the beams up into the sky like that especially because the radius of the light beams was more than 20ft. i felt really cold and worried that something wrong was happening in front of me. this was the same situation from my friend as well. the lights just suddenly stopped after 10 seconds of viewing them and the light dissipated into the sky.

my personal opinion:
the lights were no more than 500yards from eggbrough power station so i think that they were using power from the power station to send a message or beam into the sky to alert or notify some other being.
content.summary: Beams coming up from the ground flashing upwards.

content.detailedDescription: My mom sent my dad and i to pluckers off hwy 190 killeen tx;i stepped outside, looked to my left  and saw a golden orange object; looked like a big lamp post light. it was really close and hovered in place it was roundish; then it lifted with great speed and started blinking on and off red n white lights; then it turned off lights after the lights played in circular motion. i was so startled i called my mom 3 times to tell her what i saw ani am 27 yrs old! imagine. her mom saw a uso in pr. in 1959, she was 15 (grandma). my mom, step dad, and i saw one @ 905 west green ave triangular in shape displaying lights. same city killeen tx 76541.  couple of months ago mom left message this way dates are accurate. i was very nervous n felt startled till 20 minutes later when we got home.
content.summary: 2nd occurence;saw it while at pluckers off hwy 190 killeen tx;1st time witnessed by 2 family members and i;jacqueline alvarez my mom left report @your site mths. ago.

content.detailedDescription: While on duty as a security officer at app 4.20 am i was patrolling the site where i was employed.I had my camcorder with me because the night before i had noticed strange lights in the sky.I was looking north east when i observer a strange object heading in my direction i took my  camcorder and started to record it .It was making no sound i first taught it was a helicopter in the distance as it got closer no sound then as it neared it suddenly went straight up and vanished in a matter of seconds .There was like a trail on the edges not like what an aeroplane would leave contrail it was different .I know of nothing that could have moved like this i felt it was not manmade.It travelled right twords me and then shot straight up. regards.
content.summary: Red globe in middle no sound.

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: On august 29th, we witnessed a ufo in our area at 9:15 at night. (see previous report.) at 9:10, last night, we (husband, myself and 2 children) went out to the back patio and in the same area, at the same altitude, there was the same kind of ufo as we saw the night before. it began moving up, down, left right, in one general area. going up and below the tree line. we found this really hard to believe because of the previous night's experience. same object golden, orangish colored ball of light. zigzagging flight pattern. moving almost effortlessly. after observing it for about 10 minutes, it lowered down and traveled s-sw until we could no longer see it. about 20 minutes later, we saw it again, in the sw sky, but very high up in the air. we watched it travel a vast length of the sky before disappearing after a minute or less. about 20 minutes after that, we saw a slow moving aircraft approaching our house from the north. as it traveled over our heads, it had a low rumbling engine sound and we saw that it had 3 bright white circular lights on the underneath, forming a triangle with a red bright light in the center. the lights were signaling in a beaconish sort of pattern. white would blink and then the red. we have never seen anything like that either, but suspected that it was a man-made craft of sorts. certainly nothing like the fiery ball of light we had witnessed two nights in a row. but the odds of seeing this recon-like craft about 40 minutes after our 2nd night in a row of a ufo sighting in the same spot, at the same time, was pretty strange, we must admit. we will be looking in the same area in the low sky tonight at 9:00 to see if this ball of light appears again. honestly, the strangest thing we have ever seen.
content.summary: Fiery colored ball agile light

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At 9:15 pm, we came on to our back patio which faces west. we saw what looked like a planet or a star at tree line level. very bright. golden orange in color. we found this strange as we are not used to seeing anything like that so low in the sky. we sat and looked at it for about 5 minutes. as it was so still, my husband took out his iphone planet/star finder and nothing was indicated in that area. at this time the object began to move slightly up, down, left and right in the same area. it was silent. glowing brightly, but not casting light beyond itself. no blinking or pulsing lights. it did this for about 5 minutes before heading below the tree line briefly and then up and out to the n-nw at a rapid speed. as it was traveling, it kept it's sawtooth like pattern. we watched it until it was out of our sight. we have never seen anything like it. about a half hour later, there were multiple aircraft in the vicinity.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Yellow orange ball of light

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: At 9:15 pm, we came on to our back patio which faces west. we saw what looked like a planet or a star at tree line level. very bright. golden orange in color. we found this strange as we are not used to seeing anything like that so low in the sky. we sat and looked at it for about 5 minutes. as it was so still, my husband took out his iphone planet/star finder and nothing was indicated in that area. at this time the object began to move slightly up, down, left and right in the same area. it was silent. glowing brightly, but not casting light beyond itself. no blinking or pulsing lights. it did this for about 5 minutes before heading below the tree line briefly and then up and out to the n-nw at a rapid speed. as it was traveling, it kept it's sawtooth like pattern. we watched it until it was out of our sight. we have never seen anything like it. about a half hour later, there were multiple aircraft in the vicinity.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Yellow orange ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Today the weather was very hot and during the sunset above the sun i saw the object flying. i tried tracking it but it disappeared . it lookek like silver/chrome color. wanted to take a pic but i couldnt find it. this made me a believer!
content.summary: during the sunset above the sun i saw the object flying

content.detailedDescription:
My husband was at work at the railroad around 8:35pm and he saws 4 light going up and down and changing direction. at first he thought they were firework because they were shooting some around area but he notice that they wear still there. they came together and they went off. he lost track of it. 
i was going north over the bridge around 8:40pm where the railroad tracks are located. my son and i witness a big light and it just was moving real fast.  i got a little video of it. my husband took pictures but could not take more because he was working. he called me and said you would not believe what i just saw. i told him i was in the area where he saw it.
content.summary: Four lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching an approaching storm when object came from the north heading south it was hovering like it was observing the storm it was amber colored and it looked like the color pulsed. it went into a cloud bank and came back out and ho vered then started to
. head south then stopped then it took off so fast it was faster then anything ive ever seen and it made absolutely no noise what so ever.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was watching approaching storm when object came from the north it stopped several times hovered and then took off with extreme speed and no sound

content.detailedDescription: On clear nights i like to go out and star gaze as we are about the 2000 foot level and we are above much of the haze that plagues the valley. this event has occurred over many nights, it was the pulsating effect that caught my attention, it would at roughly 11:00pm be initially spotted to the west or the north west (close to where i can see the big dipper) and between 3 and 4 am end up to the north east just above the horizon. at first i assumed it to be an aircraft as it was varied as to location when initially viewed and many nights wouldn't appear at all. but when viewed thru a scope or telescope it appeared to pulsate with blue,green and red. it was difficult to determine its shape due to this pulsating effect and it seemed to have a halo around it as well. on the nights it appeared it would be at about 30 degrees off of horizon and over 4-5 hours move till it was to the northeast, just above the horizon and that's where it would end up each time. just to make sure i was not seeing things i had the wife come out and view this oddity and she agreed it was no aircraft. just before the break of dawn it would disappear
content.summary: A pulsating object that started to the west and would end up to the north east just above horizon

content.detailedDescription: At 905pm on friday august 30 i saw a very bright white light coming towards me in the sky, it shape was almost round like two bowls together, and about the size of a car. i watched it come closer and was traveling at same as a plane, about half mile or less it just stopped, stayed their for 20 seconds, then blue lights blinked on one side then red on the other side, it started moving left and stop, then right and stop, then changing different colors with red and green, then traveling left then stop, then right stop then around then stop then back again to left right., still changing colors again to blue on one side and white on the other, this was all in 1-2 minutes, then it stopped and all colors came on and started coming down behind trees in front of me, this was like nothing i have ever seen and i have a aerospace background hope other people saw it also, after it went behind the trees me ears popped.,
content.summary: Bright light all colors going fast stop left right then landed

content.detailedDescription:
On august 29, 2013 my husband, daughter, son and i witnessed 3 orange glowing orbs hovering in a triangular formation ne of my home.  they pulsated from bright to dim.  two of the three orbs ejected bright illuminated objects and or sparks/flares.  we watched them for approximately 5 to 10 minutes until they slowly disappeared.  this is the second night in a row we witnessed the 3 orbs.  they were in the same general location as the night before, but maybe a little farther out.

our feelings?  we were all excitedly discussing what they could be including chinese lanterns, some type of military flares or something else.
content.summary: 3 orange orbs in triangular formation over north tustin, orange county, california.  two ejected objects.

content.detailedDescription: Receved call from relative asking if i noticed orange lights in sky. was just arriving home and got out of truck and looked east and noticed 5 orange "balls traveling at a slow and steady rate of speed from sw to ne. no sound and below cloud cover. there was a plane travelling ahead of this formation from e to w. never saw anything like this! 3 other witnesses. they reported to me that they saw 10-15 total. all traveling in uniform and same direction. best description available, "flare like" but with a definate flight pattern.
content.summary: Multiple orange lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home looking at the sky.  noticed "stars" moving slowly.  one larger, and then 2-6 smaller lights following, seeming to appear and disappear.  they would stop and start again.  2 lights changed direction from e. to w. to n. to s. and moved toward each other and crossed paths.  

i considered airplanes at first, but then noticed the stopping and starting, and direction changes.  i thought that this was not an airplane or a satellite because of the motions.  i was excited to see it.  went inside to have my husband observe also. the objects just seemed to disappear, but it was partly cloudy.
content.summary: 2 lights changed direction from e. to w. to n. to s. and moved toward each other.
